Class SMSMailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Phillip.Krall.SMSMailer.SMSMailer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GMailSMSMailer

    public abstract class SMSMailer
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract SMSMailer used for basic setup of SMS mailing.

    1.0.0 Build Sept 19, 2014
    Author:
    Phillip Krall
